Content_FullWidth.Name: Hotel Listings
Content_FullWidth.Title: Local Hotel Listings
Content_FullWidth.BodyCopy:
BYU-Idaho has contracts with local hotels to assist with the lodging of overnight business-related guests. This website provides information on pricing.  The reservation needs to be direct billed to get these rates.  Please fill out a University Guest Travel Request form and let us know which hotel we need to book.  If you require additional information, click on the name of the underlined hotel to see their individual websites, or contact Purchasing & Travel at 496-2340. 
*Note: Pricing is subject to change without notification.

Quality Inn
1513 W. Main Street
Rexburg, ID 83440
(208)359-1311
RATE: $64.00
Continental breakfast, indoor pool, hot tub, exercise room, conference room (seats 30), cable TV, high speed internet access in all rooms, handicap rooms available. Price available year-round, except Mother's Week and Graduation
CONTACT: BYU-Idaho Travel Office @ 496-2340
Last Update: 04/08/14

Springhill Suites
1177 S Yellowstone Hwy
Rexburg, ID 83440
(208)356-3003
RATE: $72.00
Continental breakfast, free high-speed wireless internet & voicemail, iPod technology, heated indoor pool, exercise room, studio suites, kitchenettes
CONTACT: BYU-Idaho Travel Office @ 496-2340
Last Update: 04/08/14

AmericInn Lodge & Suites
1098 Golden Beauty Dr.
Rexburg, ID 
208)356-5333
RATE: $65.90
Enchanced continental breakfast, free high-speed internetaccess in every room, complimentary USA Today newspapers, large indoor pool, whirpool and exercise facility
CONTACT: BYU-Idaho Travel Office @ 496-2340
Last Update: 04/08/14
